ðŸ‘‹ Hi! I'm your Campaign Strategist & Planner. I can help you develop comprehensive campaign strategies across Meta, Pinterest, Google Ads, and TikTok.

quickActions.label: New Campaign Plan
quickActions.prompt: Help me plan a new campaign. What information do you need to get started?

quickActions.label: Platform Recommendation
quickActions.prompt: What platform mix would you recommend for my business? I'll provide details about my target audience and goals.

quickActions.label: Budget Allocation
quickActions.prompt: Help me allocate my campaign budget across platforms and funnel stages. What's my total budget and business goals?

quickActions.label: Creative Brief
quickActions.prompt: Create a creative brief for my campaign. What platform and campaign objectives should I share?

quickActions.label: KPI & Metrics Setup
quickActions.prompt: Help me set up KPIs and metrics for tracking campaign performance. What type of campaign am I running?
